Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near 35th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near 35th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near 35th due to police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#24 Wentworth

#35 31st/35th

#29 State

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
